scripts.dev: yarn && ncp ./.tools/.env.development .env && rimraf ./build &&  npm run migrate:dev  &&   razzle start
scripts.build: rimraf node_modules && yarn && rimraf ./build && NODE_ENV=production razzle build --noninteractive
scripts.migrate:build: rimraf ./build/migration  && cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src/migration -d build/migration
scripts.migrate:beta: npm run migrate:build && ncp ./.tools/.env.beta-migration build/migration/.env && cross-env NODE_ENV=migration node -r dotenv/config build/migration/index.js dotenv_config_path=build/migration/.env
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run migrate:build && ncp ./.tools/.env.production-migration build/migration/.env && cross-env NODE_ENV=migration node -r dotenv/config build/migration/index.js dotenv_config_path=build/migration/.env
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run migrate:build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node  -r dotenv/config build/migration/index.js
scripts.build:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:clean && babel src --out-dir dist --ignore node_modules,dist,**/src/**/*.spec.js,./src/**/story.js --source-maps --watch --root-mode upward
scripts.deploy:local: ncp ./.tools/.env.production.local .env && npm run build && npm run docker
